snippet.title: PVKK: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant Gameplay Overview - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
Our final Ones to Watch yearbook entry for this year's Gamescom showcase concerned PVKK: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant, an immersive bunker simulator where you manage a planetary defence cannon. It's coming to PC in 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #pvkk #gamescom
